Heritage Store Rosewater Clay Mask

Brand: Heritage Store

Category: Mask

Ingredients: ALOE BARBADENSIS (ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE*, KAOLIN, MONTMORILLONITE, ROSA DAMASCENA (DAMASK ROSE) FLOWER WATER*, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, PROPANEDIOL, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, ISOAMYL LAURATE, CETEARYL OLIVATE, GLUCONOLACTONE, PHENOXYETHANOL, SORBITAN OLIVATE, CELLULOSE GU

LIVATE, CELLULOSE GUM, ROSA GALLICA (FRENCH ROSE) FLOWER EXTRACT, ROSA DAMASCENA (DAMASK ROSE) FLOWER OIL, ALGIN, ISOAMYL COCOATE. *ORGANIC

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
